info.name: BizOps360 Go API - Local
info.description:
Local development API collection for BizOps360 Go Backend

**Base URL:** http://localhost:8080

**Total Endpoints: 20**
- Health & Info: 4 endpoints (no auth)
- Stripe: 7 endpoints (6 require API key, 1 webhook - no auth)
- Estimate: 2 endpoints (API key required)
- Email: 3 endpoints (API key required)
- Calendar: 1 endpoint (no auth)
- Zapier: 1 endpoint (no auth)
- V1 Pipeline: 2 endpoints (no auth)

**Environment Variables:**
- `base_url_local`: http://localhost:8080
- `api_key`: test-api-key-12345 (default local dev key)

**Usage:**
1. Import this collection into Postman
2. Make sure your local server is running: `cd go && .\start-local.ps1`
3. All requests will use http://localhost:8080

request.description:
Root endpoint - Returns service information and available endpoints

**curl:**
```bash
curl "http://localhost:8080/"
```

Health check endpoint - Returns service health status

**curl:**
```bash
curl "http://localhost:8080/api/health"
```

Readiness check endpoint - Returns service readiness status

**curl:**
```bash
curl "http://localhost:8080/api/health/ready"
```

Liveness check endpoint - Returns service liveness status

**curl:**
```bash
curl "http://localhost:8080/api/health/live"
```

request.description:
Create a deposit payment

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/deposit" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com",
    "name": "Test User",
    "estimatedTotal": 1000.0
  }'
```

Calculate deposit amount from estimate

**Query Parameters:**
- `estimate`: Estimate amount in dollars
- `deposit`: Manual deposit amount in dollars (optional)

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X GET "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/deposit/calculate?estimate=1000" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}"
```

Create deposit and send email

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/deposit/with-email" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com",
    "name": "Test User",
    "estimatedTotal": 1000.0
  }'
```

Get booking deposit amount by estimate (equivalent to STRIPE_GET_BOOKING_DEPOSIT_AMOUNT)

**Request Body:**
- `estimatedTotal`: Estimated total in dollars
- `estimate`: Alternative field for estimated total
- `depositValue`: Optional manual override

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/deposit/amount" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "estimatedTotal": 1000.0
  }'
```

Create final invoice for remaining balance after deposit (equivalent to SEND_FINAL_INVOICE)

**Request Body:**
- `email`: Customer email (required)
- `name`: Customer name (required)
- `totalAmount`: Total event cost in dollars (or `totalAmountCents`)
- `depositPaid`: Deposit already paid in dollars (or `depositPaidCents`)
- `currency`: Currency code (default: usd)
- `description`: Invoice description
- `sendEmail`: Whether to send invoice via Stripe email

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/final-invoice" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com",
    "name": "Test User",
    "totalAmount": 1000.0,
    "depositPaid": 400.0
  }'
```

Stripe webhook endpoint for invoice payment events (handles CLIENT_PAID_BOOKING_DEPOSIT and CLIENT_PAID_FINAL_INVOICE)

**Note:** This endpoint does not require API key authentication. Stripe signs webhook requests.

**Event Types Handled:**
- `invoice.paid` - When an invoice is paid
- `invoice.payment_succeeded` - When payment succeeds

**Metadata:**
- `invoice_type: "deposit"` or `"booking_deposit"` - Triggers booking deposit paid handler
- `invoice_type: "final"` - Triggers final invoice paid handler

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/webhook" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "id": "evt_test",
    "type": "invoice.paid",
    "data": {
      "object": {
        "id": "in_test",
        "status": "paid",
        "customer_email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com"
      }
    }
  }'
```

Test Stripe integration

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/stripe/test" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{}'
```

Calculate event estimate

**Request Body:**
- `eventDate`: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format
- `durationHours`: Number of hours (float)
- `numHelpers`: Number of helpers (integer)

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/estimate" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "eventDate": "2025-12-25",
    "durationHours": 4,
    "numHelpers": 2
  }'
```

Get special dates (holidays, etc.)

**Query Parameters:**
- `years`: Number of years ahead (default: 5, max: 5)

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X GET "http://localhost:8080/api/estimate/special-dates?years=5" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}"
```

Send test email **Request Body:** - `to`: Recipient email (required) - `subject`: Email subject (required if html provided) - `html`: HTML email body (required) - `text`: Plain text email body (optional) - `from`: Sender email (optional) - `fromName`: Sender name (optional) **curl:** ```bash curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/email/test" \ -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "to": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com", "subject": "Test Email", "html": "

This is a test email

" }' ```

Send booking deposit email

**Request Body:**
- `name`: Customer name (required)
- `email`: Customer email (required)
- Additional fields as needed for email template

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/email/booking-deposit" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com"
  }'
```

Send final invoice email (equivalent to SEND_PAID_BOOKING_INV_SEND_EMAIL for final invoices)

**Request Body:**
- `name`: Customer name (required)
- `email`: Customer email (required)
- `totalAmount`: Total event cost in dollars (required)
- `depositPaid`: Deposit amount already paid in dollars (required)
- `remainingBalance`: Remaining balance in dollars (required)
- `invoiceUrl`: Stripe invoice URL (required)

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/email/final-invoice" \
  -H "X-Api-Key: {{api_key}}" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com",
    "totalAmount": 1000.0,
    "depositPaid": 400.0,
    "remainingBalance": 600.0,
    "invoiceUrl": "https://invoice.stripe.com/i/test"
  }'
```

request.description:
Create a calendar event - Replicates Apps Script createEvent function

**Request Body:**
- `calendarId`: (Optional) Calendar ID, defaults to ESTIMATE_SENT_CALENDAR_ID env var
- `clientName`: Client name (required)
- `occasion`: Event occasion (required)
- `guestCount`: Number of guests (required)
- `eventDate`: Event date in YYYY-MM-DD or formatted format (required)
- `eventTime`: Event time in "3:04 PM" or "15:04" format (required)
- `phone`: Client phone number
- `location`: Event location address
- `numHelpers`: Number of helpers (required)
- `duration`: Duration in hours, must be >= 1 (required)
- `totalCost`: Total cost estimate
- `emailId`: Client email address
- `threadId`: Gmail thread ID (optional, for email link)
- `dataSource`: Source of the event (e.g., "zapier", "email_label_extracting")
- `status`: Event status (defaults to "Pending")

**Response:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "eventId": "google-calendar-event-id"
}
```

**Error Response:**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "Error message"
}
```

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/calendar/create" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "clientName": "John Doe",
    "occasion": "Birthday Party",
    "guestCount": 50,
    "eventDate": "2025-07-10",
    "eventTime": "4:00 PM",
    "numHelpers": 2,
    "duration": 5.0
  }'
```

**Note:** Requires `GMAIL_CREDENTIALS_JSON` environment variable to be set with Google service account credentials.

request.description:
Process lead from Zapier - Replicates Apps Script sendEstimateAndAddToCalendarFromZapier flow

**Request Body:**
- `first_name`: Client first name (required)
- `last_name`: Client last name (required)
- `email_address`: Client email (required)
- `phone_number`: Client phone number
- `event_date`: Event date (YYYY-MM-DD or formatted date)
- `event_time`: Event time (e.g., "4:00 PM")
- `event_location`: Event address (required)
- `helpers_requested`: Number of helpers (e.g., "I Need 2 Helpers")
- `for_how_many_hours`: Duration (e.g., "for 5 Hours")
- `occasion`: Event occasion
- `guests_expected`: Expected guest count (e.g., "50" or "300 - 400 Guests")
- `dryRun`: If true, email will be marked as dry run

**Response:**
- `referenceNumber`: Generated quote ID
- `success`: Boolean indicating success
- `emailSent`: Boolean indicating if email was sent
- `estimate`: Calculated estimate amount
- `calendarCreated`: Boolean indicating if calendar event was created
- `calendarError`: Error message if calendar creation failed
- `eventId`: Calendar event ID if created
- `lat`: Latitude from geocoding
- `long`: Longitude from geocoding
- `fullAddress`: Formatted address from geocoding

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/zapier/process-lead" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "first_name": "John",
    "last_name": "Doe",
    "email_address": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com",
    "event_date": "2025-07-10",
    "event_time": "4:00 PM",
    "event_location": "2300 Hitzert Ct, Fenton, MO 63026",
    "helpers_requested": "I Need 2 Helpers",
    "for_how_many_hours": "for 5 Hours",
    "occasion": "Birthday Party",
    "guests_expected": "50"
  }'
```

Submit form event

**Request Body:**
- `source`: Event source (e.g., "webhook")
- `businessId`: Business identifier
- `formKey`: Form identifier
- `payload`: Form data

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/v1/form-events" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "source": "webhook",
    "businessId": "business-123",
    "formKey": "contact-form",
    "payload": {
      "name": "John Doe",
      "email": "bizops-dev-alexey-at-shevelyov-dot-com@shevelyov.com"
    }
  }'
```

Trigger pipeline execution

**Request Body:**
- `source`: Trigger source
- `businessId`: Business identifier
- `triggerKey`: Trigger identifier
- `pipelineKey`: Pipeline identifier
- `payload`: Trigger data

**curl:**
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/v1/triggers" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "source": "trigger",
    "businessId": "business-123",
    "triggerKey": "on-booking",
    "pipelineKey": "booking-pipeline",
    "payload": {}
  }'
```
